title: Quick fish soup
ingredients: ['1 tbsp olive oil', '2 shallots, finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '900ml fish or chicken stock', 'pinch of saffron', '1 bay leaf', '250g potatoes, peeled and cut into 1cm dice', '225g frozen mixed vegetables', '3 tomatoes, about 300g in total, skinned, deseeded and diced', '200g cod fillet, cut into 2.5cm chunks', '340g seafood cocktail (mussels, squid rings and prawns), thawed if frozen']
